definition: a summary of your academic and work history, take up or begin anew
details:
noun
- a summary of your academic and work history
= synonyms: curriculum vitae
- short descriptive summary (of events)
= synonyms: survey
verb
- take up or begin anew
= example: take up or begin anew
= synonyms: restart, re-start
- return to a previous location or condition
= example: return to a previous location or condition
= synonyms: take up
- give a summary (of)
= synonyms: summarize, summarise, sum up
- assume anew
= example: assume anew
